While the central theme explores love and the responsibilities of an alpha werewolf, the narrative became repetitive, leaving some elements unexplained or nonsensical. I found myself skimming through pages, as the suspense and action lacked depth, rendering the plot predictable and less engaging.

It’s a decent story but could have been much better with more suspense, action, and emotional complexity.
